tables.description: Information about blueprint descriptions, including ID, name, status, and synchronization details.
Information about deployment descriptions, including ID, commit details, image, status, and timestamps.
Information about disk descriptions, including ID, name, size, mount path, and timestamps.
Information about environment group descriptions, including ID, name, owner, service links, and timestamps.
Information about environment descriptions, including ID, name, project details, and associated resources.
Information about header descriptions, including ID, path, name, and value.
Information about job descriptions, including ID, service details, status, and timestamps.
Information about PostgreSQL database descriptions, including ID, configuration, status, and timestamps.
Information about project descriptions, including ID, name, owner, and associated environments.
Information about route descriptions, including ID, type, source, destination, and priority.
Information about service descriptions, including ID, name, environment, and deployment configuration.
